text: Mikko Larkas (born June 22, 1981) is a Finnish professional basketball coach, currently head coach of the Helsinki Seagulls.Helsinki Seagulls Head Coach Mikko Larkas to Manage Team in GBSL, globalbasketball.com. Accessed 23 January 2018 Further, he has been the assistant coach of Finland’s national basketball team. ==References== ==External links== * Eurobasket.com profile * RealGM profile Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Basketball coaches Category:Finnish basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Espoo
title: Mikko Larkas
